item.title: Welcome
item.description: Welcome to the IBM CloudPak for AIOps Training In this Training you will learn how to install IBM CloudPak for AIOps and how to configure some basic functionnalities. The idea is to provide an optimised way for you to learn CP4WAIOPS. In the end you will have a demo environment containing the following components:
